    id_vars = df.columns[:6],     
    value_vars = df.columns[6:-1],  # 数据列范围

source.8d2e2b4b:
## Platform(平台)
PS2, PS3, X360, Wii, DS and PS are the largest sales. If you want to launch the platform, just invest in these. Other returns are relatively poor.

PS2,PS3,X360,WII,DS,PS是最大的销售额,若是要平台投放,投这些就好了,其他的回报相对差
source.25db571b: # Outliers are not handled(异常值不做处理)
source.c871a5c3: # Two dimensional to one dimensional(二维转一维)
source.ad47c25c:
## Genre(游戏类型)
The sales volume of action type is the largest, especially in North America and Europe.followed by sports games

action类型销售量是最大的,特别是在北美和欧洲.其次是运动类型游戏
source.4e1e85b1:
# Year(发布年份)

The curve gradually rose to 2008 and then decreased. The game revenue released from 2006 to 2011 is the highest. This may be the rise of online games and gradually replace stand-alone games. Because the data is the release year, not the revenue of each year, it does not represent the decline of stand-alone game revenue. Perhaps the later developed games will get better sales through promotion and hardware equipment update

曲线逐渐上升至2008年,之后下降.2006-2011发布的游戏收入最高.这或许是网络游戏的兴起,逐渐替代了单机游戏.由于数据是发布年份,并不是各年的收入,并不能代表单机游戏收入下滑.或许通过推广和硬件设备更新,后面开发的游戏会得到更好的销售.
source.4ce41b56:
# Publisher(出版商)

Top 10 Publishers.Some of the top 10 publishers have low sales in Japan, mainly in North America and Europe, perhaps related to cultural integration

前10名出版商.前10出版商有些在日本的销售量不高,主要是在北美和欧洲的销售,或许和文化的融入相关.
